channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What did Trump tell supporters to 'not waste Time and Energy' on? Take our quiz
item.description: This week, President Trump didn't want to talk about a thing. If you know what that thing is, you'll get at least one question right. Plus: Emmys! Bab...

item.title: Ask your kids' camps these key questions about heat and flood safety, experts say
item.description: Camps in nature can be great for kids, but they can also expose campers to floods, wildfires and heat. Here are the top questions experts say people s...

item.title: A playbook is forming for younger candidates. The results have so far been mixed
item.description: Calls for generational change and dissatisfaction with the status quo have been at the center of campaigns by younger candidates. While that has lifte...

item.title: What the 'One Big Beautiful Bill' will change for students, schools and colleges
item.description: School vouchers are going national and the federal student loan system is getting an overhaul. Here's what to know.

item.title: Congress hopes to raise heat on Russia amid souring relations between Trump and Putin
item.description: A bipartisan coalition has joined forces to push aggressive new sanctions on Russia and believe the souring relationship between President Trump and V...

item.title: Trump orders officials to release Epstein court documents after mounting pressure
item.description: Trump's supporters and opponents alike have demanded more disclosures related to the disgraced financier.

item.title: Trump wants Texas to redraw its congressional map. Here's what to know.
item.description: President Trump has said he wants a "simple redrawing" of Texas' congressional map where Republicans pick up five seats.

item.title: Watch: Police evacuate residents as wildfires rage in Spain
item.description: Spanish authorities estimate that 2,500 hectares (25sq km) of land have been affected in the Toledo region.

item.title: 7/17: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: President Trump diagnosed with vein condition; Former VP Pence says he’s “disappointed” by Trump’s “retribution” for January 6 riot prosecutions

item.title: North Korea bans foreigners from seaside resort weeks after opening
item.description: Tourism authorities say foreigners are "temporarily" not allowed to visit the Wonsan Kalma resort.

item.title: Colbert says The Late Show will end after 33 years
item.description: Network CBS called it a financial decision tied to the "challenging backdrop in late night" TV.

item.title: 7/16: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: President Trump denies plan to fire Fed Chair Jerome Powell; Former Vice President Mike Pence joins The Takeout

item.title: Man charged with hijacking plane, causing fighter jets to scramble
item.description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police said Shaheer Cassim, 39, has been charged with hijacking, constituting terrorism, over the incident.

item.title: 7/15: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi faces questions about handling of the Epstein files; Historic Washington, D.C., restaurant closing doors for renovations

item.title: Kill Russian soldiers, win points: Is Ukraine's new drone scheme gamifying war?
item.description: The scheme allows Ukrainian troops to trade videos of confirmed kills on the battlefield for prizes.

item.title: Here’s what to know about chronic venous insufficiency
item.description: Swollen legs led to President Donald Trump being diagnosed with what’s called chronic venous insufficiency.

item.title: The rise of masked officers is controversial new ground in American life
Emails show DeSantis administration blindsided county officials with plans for ‘Alligator Alcatraz’
